short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: First Open Source Chrome wallet for Kaspa in the world! Simple and reliable.
short.zh_CN: 全球第一款专为Kaspa设计的开源插件钱包！简单可依赖
short.zh_TW: 全球第一款專為Kaspa設計的開源插件錢包！簡單可依賴

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
KasWare Wallet is a hierarchical deterministic wallet for kaspa blockchain. It supports KRC20 token and KNS protocol. Your accounts are derived from your Secret Recovery Phrase. Your private keys are encrypted on your device by your password and are never shared with anyone. KasWare Wallet is 100% Open-source (Repository link: https://github.com/kasware-wallet/extension).
For more information visit https://www.kasware.xyz/.
long.es,fr,zh_CN,zh_TW:
KasWare Wallet is a hierarchical deterministic wallet for kaspa blockchain. Your accounts are derived from your Secret Recovery Phrase. Your private keys are encrypted on your device by your password and are never shared with anyone. KasWare Wallet is 100% Open-source (Repository link: https://github.com/kasware-wallet/extension).
For more information visit https://www.kasware.xyz/.
